name: tipjar
description: 1. Create a new GitHub repository and push the project files. 2. In Netlify, click "New site from Git" and connect your repo. 3. In Netlify site settings → Build & deploy → Environment:    - Add `STRIPE_SECRET_KEY` with your Stripe **secret** key (starts with sk_...) 4. Edit `index.html` and replace `pk_test_REPLACE_ME` with your Stripe **publishable** key (starts with pk_...). 5. Deploy the site. Netlify will build and serve your static files and serverless functions. 6. In Netlify DNS or your domain provider, create a CNAME for `donate.edsvel.com` pointing to your Netlify site (or set the domain in Netlify's Domain settings).
